```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  fig.path = 'Figures/', # Save plots in the Figures sub-folder
  dev = c('png','tiff'),# Create both PNG and TIFF files for each plot
  dev.args = list(tiff = list(compression = 'lzw')),
  dpi = 300 # Use 300 DPI
)
```

```{r diamonds, echo = FALSE}
# Naming the chunk will make the saved graphics files have the same name
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(diamonds, aes(x = cut, y=price )) + geom_boxplot()
```
